and watching your stupid little face
after telling us all your embarrassing secrets.
translation.es: después de contarnostodos tus secretos vergonzosos.

translation.en: Everyone can see you, but they can't see you like we can,
translation.es: Todos pueden verte,pero no pueden verte como nosotros,

translation.en: We know who you are and who you are ashamed of being.
translation.es: Sabemos quién eresy quién te avergüenzas de ser.

translation.en: Are you still grinding your teeth?
From the anxiety. Are you still doing that?
-Is that what she said? -That's what she said.
You ground your teeth most of your life, and you never managed to get ahold of it
translation.es: Has rechinado los dientes toda tu viday nunca pudiste controlarlo

translation.en: because you're an anxious man. Anxious, weak, pathetic man.
translation.es: porque eres un hombre ansioso.Ansioso, débil y patético.

translation.en: -Is that what she said? -[Raine] Yes.
[Luther] You're doing it now. He's doing it now.
You can't see it, but he's grinding his teeth.
translation.es: No lo ven,pero está rechinando los dientes.

translation.en: I do actually remember you when you stood by me at a bus stop
translation.es: De hecho, recuerdo cuando me hablasteen una parada de autobús

translation.en: and offered me some Juicy Fruit.
I remember that.
I thought, "What a sweaty, anxious twat. What is wrong with him?"
translation.es: Pensé: "¿Qué le pasa a este idiota,todo nervioso?".

translation.en: John! John, go. Go!
Ah! Go, go, go!
It's all right. It's okay. Hey, hey, we're gonna go home right now.
translation.es: Tranquila. Mi amor, nos vamos a casa.

translation.en: We're going home. Okay, all right? Okay.
[Raine] We have to go. Come on. Come on.
It's okay. It's okay. It's okay. Okay…
I need you to get away from that valve. It's kerosene.
translation.es: Aléjate de esa válvula. Es querosén.

translation.en: If you don't get away from that valve, we're all gonna burn.
translation.es: Si no te alejas de esa válvula,vamos a arder.

translation.en: [in Estonian] I'd rather burn.
Get on your knees and hands behind your head. Now!
translation.es: Arrodíllate y pon las manosatrás de la cabeza. ¡Ya!

translation.en: -[in English] Get back! -Get down on your knees.
[Anya] No! It's locked!
-Hey, hey, hey, open the door! -Open the door, please. -[all clamoring] -Shh. Shh.
translation.es: - ¡Oye, abre la puerta!- Abre la puerta, por favor.

translation.en: Help, please!
Mum, I can't turn it!
No! Don't!
Mum!
Get that!
No. No.
Good. Spray.
-This way. -[Anya] Thank you.
I'm okay. Can you take her, please?
Yeah, I'm okay. Yeah. Yeah.
[Schenk] Wotcha.
Evidently, I owe you £20.
It's 50.
-Ah yes. -Yeah.
-I hoped you'd forgotten. -No.
Thank you.
You know what has to happen next, John.
translation.es: Ya sabes lo que pasa ahora, John.

translation.en: [reporter] …has been named as John Luther, an ex-Metropolitan Police detective
translation.es: …un tal John Luther,exinspector de la Policía Metropolitana,

translation.en: who's believed to have sustained life-threatening injuries
translation.es: quien se cree que ha sufridolesiones potencialmente mortales

translation.en: after allegedly tracking the suspect…
-Wotcha. -Wotcha.
So where am I?
Ah. Safe house. Evidently.
translation.es: En un refugio. Por lo visto.

translation.en: -Government? -Government.
I think they got most of the blood out.
translation.es: Creo que le sacaron casi toda la sangre.

translation.en: Nice piece of invisible mending.
Who is this lot?
Uh, not quite sure, to be honest.
translation.es: No estoy seguro, para serte sincero.

translation.en: But I don't think you're going back to prison.
translation.es: Pero no creo que vuelvas a prisión.

translation.en: -A job offer, perhaps? -[Luther grunts]
[man] If I may.
Unofficially…
you did a commendable job.
So now what?
Chief would like a word.
